name: mage-os/mageos-async-events
description: An event-driven flexible async events module that allows you to process any event asynchronously.

suggest.mage-os/mageos-common-async-events: Adds default events for the async events module, like sales.order.created, sales.invoice.paid or customer.address.updated
suggest.mage-os/mageos-async-events-admin-ui: Adds a basic admin UI for the async events module which can be used to create subscribers instead of using the REST API
